Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polygon
      • Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Polygon
    Rectangle class contains essential information about rectangle polygon: number of points (4), and its x/y coordinates points contains setter method for coordinates specifically for drawing, and a regular one

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Rectangle(double[] xCoords, double[] yCoords)
      constructor for when coordinates known (when placing an already sized rectangle)
